messages.subject: Does anyone have this Heianjo Tsuba?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Shot in the dark here, but worth a try. A member has posted on my forum. Many years ago, Hal K. used to frequent the sword shows. Some may remember
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
Shot in the dark here, but worth a try.
A member has posted on my forum. Many years ago, Hal K. used to
frequent the sword shows. Some may remember him.
10 or more years ago he sold a Heianjo tsuba (Large round solid plate
with mixed soft metal flowers) to a guy either at the Chicago or
Florida show. In cleaning up his stuff, he has come across the papers
for that tsuba, and would love to unite them with the owner now.
So if anyone thinks they may have it, pop into
http://www.militaria.co.za/nmb/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=4551 for a pic and
see if you can get your origami 10 years later :-)

Brian
